member.name: DML_AXIS_DIRECTION
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the direction of an operation along the given axis for the operator (for example, summation, selecting the top-k elements, selecting the minimum element).

member.name: DML_AXIS_DIRECTION.DML_AXIS_DIRECTION_INCREASING
member.summary: Specifies increasing order (from the low index to the high index).

member.name: DML_AXIS_DIRECTION.DML_AXIS_DIRECTION_DECREASING
member.summary: Specifies decreasing order (from the high index to the low index).
